name: Eagle's Splendor, Mass
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Core Rulebook. © 2009, Paizo Publishing, LLC
target: One creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart
text: This spell functions like eagle's splendor, except that it affects multiple creatures.
target_zh: 每等级一个生物, 任意两者之间的距离不超过30尺
text_zh: 该法术的功能如同‘鹰之威仪 (eagle's splendor)’一般，不过它可以影响复数生物。
